title: Digital Integrated Education for Enhancing Medical Communication Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and understanding of digital device usage
context.additional_context: Learners, as ordinary citizens, focus on acquiring practical communication skills required in medical settings

learning_goals: Learners can perform clear information delivery in various situations by applying patient-centered effective medical communication skills.
Learners cultivate the ability to analyze healthcare-related data using digital platforms and incorporate it into decision-making.
Learners design medical communication strategies considering cultural contexts and apply them to real-world cases.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
